bibl.title: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, September 19, 1919

div1.p: Blue writes that he has no objection to Carter appearing as a witness in an impounded water lawsuit.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, September 19, 1919
div1.opener:
POSTAL TELEGRAPH - COMMERCIAL CABLES
CLARENCE H MACHAY
RECEIVED AT
NIGHT TELEGRAM
DELIVERY NO.
The Postal Telegraph-Cable Company (Incorporated) transmits and delivers Night Messages subject to the terms and conditions printed on the back of the blank
24-18811
DESIGN PATENT NO. 40629
339w um 9pm 27 Govt Nite
CS Washington DC Sept 19 19
F. I. W.
Tallassee.
686
Carter
div1.p:
Bureau has no objection to your appearing as witness in
Impounded water case at Albermerle North-Carolina at no expense
to service
